sentences.simplifiedText: 他的目光紧紧地锁定在她的身上。
sentences.traditionalText: 他的目光緊緊地鎖定在她的身上。
sentences.pinyin: Tā de mùguāng jǐnjǐn dì suǒdìng zài tā de shēnshang.
sentences.translation: His gaze is tightly locked on her.

sentences.simplifiedText: 他闭上眼睛，试图避开所有的目光，但那些目光就像尖刻的针，刺入他的心中。
sentences.traditionalText: 他閉上眼睛，試圖避開所有的目光，但那些目光就像尖刻的針，刺入他的心中。
sentences.pinyin: Tā bì shàng yǎnjīng, shìtú bìkāi suǒyǒu de mùguāng, dàn nàxiē mùguāng jiù xiàng jiānkè de zhēn, cì rù tā de xīn zhōng.
sentences.translation: He closed his eyes, trying to avoid all the gazes, but those gazes were like sharp needles, piercing into his heart.

sentences.pinyin: tā de mùguāng luò zài le shū shàng.
sentences.translation: His sight falls on the book.

sentences.simplifiedText: 它的耳朵听得出最轻的杂音，目光却看不到自己的手。
sentences.traditionalText: 它的耳朵聽得出最輕的雜音，目光卻看不到自己的手。
sentences.pinyin: tā de ěrduo tīng de chū zuì qīng de zán yīn, mù guāng què kàn bù dào zì jǐ de shǒu.
sentences.translation: Its ears can hear the faintest noise, yet its eyes can't see its own hands.
